data.title: Cocoon (First Edition) by Yueran; Zhang; Tiang; Jeremy: New Soft cover (2022) 1st Edition
data.meta_description: 1st Edition - Soft cover - World Editions, London - 2022 - Condition: New - No Jacket - 1st Printing. Brand new copy. - Cocoon (First Edition)
data.text:
Terms of Sale:

Edition and impression of all books are as stated. All hardback books come with a protective dust jacket cover. Returns are accepted within fifteen days of receipt if book is not as described and if returned in the same condition as sent.

If you have any question or problem please feel free to contact me: fialtabooks@gmail.com. Will usually reply within 2 hours during working days.

Shipping Terms:

No extra charge for heavier books!

All orders are sent via tracked delivery!

Orders usually ship within 1-2 working days.

For overseas orders: Priority shipping is always recommended, it takes 5-14 days and has** tracking**. Standard shipping is cheaper, but takes up to 42 days.

UK orders are sent via 1st class (standard), or next day guarantee (priority).

Faster shipping available upon request.

All books are professionally packed with bubble wrap and in a double wall cardboard box.
